message.text: Hello Shahid! How are you today?
Hey! I'm doing great, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm good too, just catching up on some work. Did you watch the latest movie?
Yes, I did! It was amazing. Have you seen it?
No, not yet. I'm planning to watch it this weekend. How was the ending?
I won't spoil it for you! You'll have to watch and find out. By the way, have you tried that new restaurant downtown?
Not yet, but I've heard good things about it. We should plan a dinner there sometime.
Definitely! Let's make it happen next week. Anyway, got to go now. Talk to you later!
Sure, talk to you later. Take care!
